mil3.7.11:1.6_0: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, mahārāja, sutapubbo te koci kākacchamāno”ti.
mil3.7.11:1.8_0: “Kiṁ nu kho, mahārāja, so saddo kāye namite virameyyā”ti.
mil3.7.11:1.10_1: saddo abhāvitakāyassa abhāvitasīlassa abhāvitacittassa abhāvitapaññassa kāye namite viramissati,
mil3.7.11:1.10_2: kiṁ pana bhāvitakāyassa bhāvitasīlassa bhāvitacittassa bhāvitapaññassa catutthajjhānaṁ samāpannassa assāsapassāsā na nirujjhissantī”ti.
